name: Gun assmebly in the Dark
description:
This is a very short game about a depressed man in the apocalypse, assembling a gun in their bunker for some reason. (I've come to notice, I nearly always games about dark stuff.)

This was made for the 57th Mini Jam.

CREDITS:

Pistol sounds:

          

Pistol model: PERFECT GAMES: 1911 Pistol Pack (Unity Store)

Music: ROZKOL - Ambient I-IV

textures: https://www.photoshopsupply.com/patterns-textures/free-dust-textures#
